net.nologin.meep.tbv

Class Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Some people think that such utility classes are a bad idea. Some people don't.

    • Method Detail

      • getMemDebugString

        public static java.lang.String getMemDebugString()
        Get some debug information about memory status, used in the information box when debug is enabled in the view. This has a bit of a negative impact on performance, but is worth it to see how the heap gets used up as you scroll around in a poorly written provider.
        Returns:
        A string of the format:
        [rt_alloced]/[rt_available]MB, nat([native_allocated]/[native_avail]MB)

      • isHeapAlmostFull

        public static boolean isHeapAlmostFull()
        Returns:
        true if the ratio of available memory starts getting low. Used for some debug render candy (eg turn the text red)
